thread.title: NY district attorney's policy barring guns prompts debate
thread.title_full: NY district attorney's policy barring guns prompts debate - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: NY district attorney's policy barring guns prompts debate
text: MINEOLA, N.Y. (AP) - After a suburban district attorney in New York barred her prosecutors from keeping handguns, even at home, her office said the goal was safety. But the now-changed restriction has touched off debate about whether prosecutors should be packing heat. The Nassau County DA's office loosened the ... ...
